column4: I installed xfce and Enlightnement, yet when I reboot, I cant see them listed in the session menu :/ anyone know what I did wrong?
no, I installed xmms and it didn't show up either so, sorry I can't help ya.
I dunno, I know there are some out there...
if you do find one for mpeg/avi-type files, please let me know,  I have a project comming up that would require such a program ^_^
